description:
In the lead-up to a vote from Vancouver city council this week about whether to reinstate a ban on natural gas heating in new homes, an industry group called Resource Works that has ties to some of the country’s biggest gas producers sent out an urgent request to its email list.  “Action needed,” the subject […]

The post Industry Group Pre-Wrote Comments for ‘Workers’ Opposing Vancouver Gas Ban appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Industry Group Pre-Wrote Comments for ‘Workers’ Opposing Vancouver Gas Ban

description:
Smallholders are calling on the EU to scrap Ireland’s nitrates derogation, arguing that pollution of the air, waterways and soil is causing havoc to the land and their livelihoods. Ahead of a snap general election taking place this Friday, November 29, Ireland’s three biggest political parties have all pledged to fight for a continued exemption […]

The post Nitrates Derogation is a ‘Con’, Says Ireland’s Farmers appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Nitrates Derogation is a ‘Con’, Says Ireland’s Farmers
